p: Ninth, it is still debatable as to whether antiplatelets or anticoagulants are preferred in acute stroke patients with COVID-19. Due to a lack of any definite studies, it is recommended to follow the existing guidelines to administer single or dual antiplatelet agents to such patients, and to withhold these drugs for 24 h post-thrombolysis or thrombectomy. Superiority of one antiplatelet agent over another is yet to be defined.
